subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: In a highlight-mad world, Kevin Love, a star at U.C.L.A., plays an old-school game, modeled after the former Baltimore and Washington Bullets star Wes Unseld, a family friend.
snippet: In a highlight-mad world, Kevin Love, a star at U.C.L.A., plays an old-school game, modeled after the former Baltimore and Washington Bullets star Wes Unseld, a family friend.
